title: thalli ninu nera
sahitya:
,,,,talli | ninnu nera |



,,,,nammi- | naanu vina- |



vE ... ||







anupallavi







,,,,ella lO- | ,,,,kamula |



,,,,kaadaara- | mai yunna naa ||



(talli)







caraNam







,,,,shyaama kru- | ,,,,shNa pari- |



paalini | jananee ||



,,,,kaamitaa- | rttha prada |



kanja | lOcani ||



kowmaari raa- | ,,,,Ni puraa- |



,,,,Ni paraa- | shakti ||



kaama | kOTi |



peeDaadi | vaasini ||



(talli)
